revised_title: Elastic Deformation and Torsion of Compressible Isotropic Bodies
tldr: The article explores the finite elastic deformation, extension, inflation, and torsion of compressible isotropic bodies, providing formulas for stress and strain-energy functions. It also examines the symmetrical inflation of an isotropic spherical shell and the conditions for eversion. The findings contribute to the understanding of material behavior under various deformations.
